title: Tactical Gaming - Looking for a fun, social or serious team? Join TG today!

embed.description: Welcome to Tactical Gaming Register now to join our community of like minded gamers. TG consists of active gamers which have a "real life first" mindset. We aim to satisfy our member's needs for team based gaming by having our Tactical Warfare franchise for warfare based games and our Tactical Sports franchise for sports based games.

body:
Tactical Gaming is a community which sports multiple games, having League of Legends as one of their divisions! We accept all from unranked to diamond, we have squads for all types of players! Want a relaxed and fun playing experience? We have the squad for you! Want a serious and competitive playing experience? We have the squad for you! Even for those inbetween, we have the squad! 

After registering to the site you have to go through a boot camp, though it may seem tedious, it is 100% worth it once you are done! It's a one and only time thing, and is mainly used for the higher ups to have something to look at! If you need help, need not worry, I am always here for you. Simply add me on League and I shall help you the best way I can! 

So why not give us a try? Join TG today!

Because we all came from the NA region originally, we were all 1st Battalion but then OCE came around and squads split up, etc. 

That's the main reason why we're 1st Batt and not 2nd, so it's all good! 

Prac Times are as follows for OCE: 

Wednesday and Sunday 7pm - 9pm AEST (Daylight Savings the same time.)

When registering don't forget two things!
Please put "TG Sky" in the reference bit! (It helps me more than you admittedly, but please.)
Put 1st Battalion, not 2nd! (League of Legends division is run differently to the rest.)

I look forward to seeing your name pop up in the TG community!

Headquarters: http://www.tacticalgaming.net/hq/
History: http://www.tacticalgaming.net/history
About us: http://www.tacticalgaming.net/hq/new...actical-gaming
Regulations: http://www.tacticalgaming.net/hq/news/regulations
Quick Registration: http://www.tacticalgaming.net/hq/index.php?app=referrals&reff=6914

(When you register please reply here saying so, for both organisation reasons and bumping reasons!)

Thanks for reading!

P.S. If you need to contact me through Skype, please add me using the following name;  Xiryks.

replies.body: Hi, I signed up for TG a long while ago and got put on leave due to other commitments, but now it seems my account is just completely gone and I don't really wunna go through all that making another one again, so do you know where I can talk to someone to help me please, thanks. The registered name was Crusnix.

You were put on leave over six months ago, once a person is on leave for over six months the CoC assumes that you have left and deletes the account. I'm sorry, that's what you will have to do but I will happily assist you. Add me on Skype if you wish to continue. 

Xiryks - That's the Skype name.
